html:
10.6.19  6:23 am   Can you talk us through the process of writing and recording Just Did a Bad Thing?

      yes, if i can remember. the first line had been on the shelf since maybe september? [checking] october 19, 2018. it was just the first line. then when it came time to pick a song, in december, i think i narrowed it down to about 20 songs and then my mistake was that i went through those 20 and narrowed it down again, and it got narrowed down to zero. so i went back to the list of 20 and picked the one i thought was the weakest. and it was that one. then i wrote it, very fast, because i was still attempting to do the 2-week schedule at that time, but i think it had already fallen apart by then. but i think i had convinced myself of some backup plan during that time. it was a long string of failures during that time, regarding the schedule. other than that i don't remember too much about the writing process. it was pretty standard. oh here's something i remember about the writing: the 'hey, what's the name of this game, ..etc.' all of that, after i wrote that i thought it was great but not right for this song. so i spent quite a while trying to come up with a plan B for that, and save that for a different song. i was really convinced that wasn't going to work for this song, as much as i liked it. then eventually i gave into using it. after that i think the writing went pretty smoothly and quickly. the recording process went slightly slower than some of the previous songs because i was just tired of rushing. it was probably rushed until i realized i had blown whatever the latest deadline was, then i was probably a bit more meticulous after that. and the release got screwed up too, because i was aiming for a certain date with the video so i sent it to the stores 2 days before that date, but couldn't finish the video. so the song hit the stores way before the video, by mistake. it was awkward. that turned out to be what the bad thing was

10.6.19  5:51 am   can you guess which finger am i holding behind my back?

      no, but it's probably none

10.6.19  4:52 am   How many bread you've eaten in your life

      1 thousand but i was planning to eat more

10.6.19  4:50 am   What do you do with your spare time

      how do i know which time is spare

10.6.19  4:18 am   why are you so cool

      could be some kind of defense mechanism

10.6.19  4:13 am   hello i wanna do an art so can you give me ideas please

      yes!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

10.6.19  3:55 am   hi i found you and can relate to u. can u relate to me?

      so far yes

10.6.19  3:37 am   Are we the same person?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

10.6.19  3:35 am   beef?

      i'll have to think about that

10.6.19  1:13 am   Do you want to go on a bizarre adventure

      i'm on one already, but after this one i would like to go on another one

10.6.19  12:54 am   what's your favorite type of meatball?

      spicey. wait no, i meant dicey

10.6.19  12:04 am   How does one answer a question with an outside-the-box answer, when the only option to answer is inside a box?

      who is making those options? introduce yourself to that person and then let them know you are taking a hike. then go ahead and take the hike

10.5.19  11:27 pm   wanna learn to use a theremin

      not really

10.5.19  10:24 pm   What is your opinion on the Imperial Measurement System

      very good, strong measurement system

10.5.19  10:19 pm   how do i keep the things i've ruined from ruining me. i've always liked that lyric. i think it's a very good lyric. one of your best. and i would like to do it. do you have any idea on how to proceed

      take a walk around the neighborhood. if that doesn't work take 2 more walks

10.5.19  9:59 pm   What is the moon made of?

      junk

10.5.19  9:36 pm   what is your opinion on heavy metal music?

      it's exquisite when combined with lighter metal

10.5.19  8:38 pm   overall, what would say your opinions on water are?

      it's ok

10.5.19  8:07 pm   which time portal should i jump in to find you?

      the present

10.5.19  7:42 pm   why do people try to read other people's minds when they can't even read their own

      could gain some valuable insight

10.5.19  7:39 pm   where does your sense of humor come from?

     either the atmostphere or the stratosphere, i always get those mixed up

      has it always been the same?

      it has always been changing

10.5.19  6:58 pm   What are your greatest aspirations in life?

      email myself somewhere

10.5.19  6:45 pm   How do I take over the world?

      not necessary. someone already took it over

10.5.19  6:45 pm   Planes?

      that's right

10.5.19  5:41 pm   are you a muppet?

      we'll see

10.5.19  5:39 pm   Do you answer every question?

     no

      and if not why you bully :(

      are you sure that's what a bully is

10.5.19  5:28 pm   Did you actually quit school?

      that sounds like something i would do

10.5.19  5:23 pm   best female name?

      batman

10.5.19  4:55 pm   its officially spooky month , are you doing a video on the spoops?

      that's a good idea

10.5.19  4:31 pm   how long is a moment?

      about 2 to 3 seconds

10.5.19  4:29 pm   any tips for other success in case my primary goal doesn't work out

      try it again!

10.5.19  4:10 pm   do you have anything you've made from ancient times that you think still holds up today

      if by ancient times you mean the 1990s then yes

10.5.19  3:47 pm   what is the tuning of your bass?

      A=55

10.5.19  3:43 pm   I'm sad. Can you make me happy?

      i will try

10.5.19  3:30 pm   Is the cricket sound thing you use a modified flute sound?

      no

10.5.19  3:30 pm   Get a marimba

      i have some fake ones

10.5.19  3:21 pm   thoughts on chicken fingers

      fake

10.5.19  3:19 pm   can you answer this at exactly 12:34?

      no i would prefer to answer it now, because i always answer the questions in the order they were received and i would rather not delay the rest of the questions

10.5.19  2:52 pm   Why am I still here, just to suffer?

      i was thinking something a little more enjoyable

10.5.19  2:48 pm   What are your thoughts on cows?

      they have a very interesting sort of moo-moo quality to them

10.5.19  2:48 pm   whats the painting you relate to most in long long long journey?

      i don't remember most of them. the only one i remember is the 'not found' one, but it's not that one

10.5.19  2:21 pm   What is your favorite texture or flavor of food or drink 

      mealy

10.5.19  2:20 pm   What is the bad thing you did and why do you regret the thing that you did?

      that sounds like something from a song

10.5.19  2:02 pm   what's the worst time of the work to do day

      maybe if you need nighttime footage

10.5.19  12:54 pm   Who r u gonna vote for?

      richard nixon

10.5.19  12:45 pm   Are you immortal

      we'll see

10.5.19  12:01 pm   Who's your favorite muppet?

      kim jong un

10.5.19  12:01 pm   Will you ever show your face?

      never

10.5.19  11:37 am   i just played in my band's first house show of the school year and i didn't drink OR smoke that whole night even though i had the opportunity to many times. what award do i get?

      now you get to drink and smoke, to celebrate

10.5.19  11:35 am   Have you ever been chased by a villain?

      every time i think i am, it always turns out to be me
